meanings.definition: The SI unit of electrical conductance.
meanings.sent1: One siemens measures how well electricity flows through a material.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used siemens to calculate the conductivity of the wire.
meanings.sent3: The siemens were having a race to see who could conduct electricity the fastest.
meanings.sent4: His brain was like a siemens, conducting thoughts at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The siemens glowed brightly, showing the strength of the electrical current.

meanings.definition: A company that manufactures electrical equipment.
meanings.sent1: I bought my new toaster from Siemens.
meanings.sent2: Siemens is known for producing high-quality electrical appliances.
meanings.sent3: The Siemens factory was buzzing with activity as they made the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a Siemens, churning out innovative ideas every day.
meanings.sent5: The Siemens logo shone brightly on the front of the store, drawing customers in.
